sys_update_xml.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_script"><sys_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><abort_action>false</abort_action><access>package_private</access><action_delete>false</action_delete><action_insert>false</action_insert><action_query>false</action_query><action_update>true</action_update><active>true</active><add_message>false</add_message><advanced>true</advanced><change_fields>false</change_fields><client_callable>false</client_callable><collection>em_alert</collection><condition/><description/><execute_function>false</execute_function><filter_condition table="em_alert">source=Datadog^type=26ba3bf897983110d8eab376f053af3d^incidentISNOTEMPTY^additional_infoVALCHANGES^EQ<item endquery="false" field="source" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="Datadog"/><item display_table="em_event_type" display_value="Datadog Case" endquery="false" field="type" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value="26ba3bf897983110d8eab376f053af3d"/><item endquery="false" field="incident" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="ISNOTEMPTY" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="false" field="additional_info" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="VALCHANGES" or="false" value=""/><item endquery="true" field="" goto="false" newquery="false" operator="=" or="false" value=""/></filter_condition><is_rest>false</is_rest><message/><name>Datadog Case Alert Update</name><order>100</order><priority>100</priority><rest_method/><rest_method_text/><rest_service/><rest_service_text/><rest_variables/><role_conditions/><script><![CDATA[(function executeRule(current, previous /*null when async*/) {

	var record = new GlideRecord('incident');
	record.addQuery("sys_id", current.incident.sys_id);
	record.query();
	record.next();
	record.work_notes = JSON.parse(current.additional_info.toString()).work_note;
	record.update();

})(current, previous);]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-25 20:57:02</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>1d8dbb3097d83110d8eab376f053afe5</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Datadog Case Alert Update</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Datadog" source="x_datad_datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Datadog">28a41a50db032200c1e6771ebf961998</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_1d8dbb3097d83110d8eab376f053afe5</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-25 20:57:02</sys_updated_on><template/><when>after</when></sys_script><sys_translated_text action="delete_multiple" query="documentkey=1d8dbb3097d83110d8eab376f053afe5"/></record_update>
